name: bar123-history-sync-extension
description: Safari extension for P2P history synchronization

scripts.build: npm run bundle-trystero && npm run copy-assets
scripts.bundle-trystero: npm run build-trystero-bundle && cp dist/trystero-bundle.js 'bar123 Extension/Resources/' && cp dist/trystero-bundle.js chrome-extension/
scripts.build-chrome: npm run bundle-trystero && npm run copy-chrome-assets
scripts.copy-chrome-assets: mkdir -p chrome-extension/images && cp 'bar123 Extension/Resources/images/'* chrome-extension/images/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Images copied or not found'
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.ios-build-testflight: npm run prepare-profiles && npm run ios-build -- --upload --apple-id $APPLE_ID --app-password $APP_SPECIFIC_PASSWORD
scripts.ios-build-local: npm run prepare-profiles && npm run ios-build
scripts.ci:test: npm run test 2>&1 | tee test-output.log; TEST_EXIT=${PIPESTATUS[0]}; echo "TEST_EXIT_CODE=$TEST_EXIT" >> $GITHUB_ENV; exit $TEST_EXIT
scripts.ci:test-local-multiplatform: npm run test-local-multiplatform 2>&1 | tee local-multiplatform-test-output.log; LOCAL_TEST_EXIT=${PIPESTATUS[0]}; echo "LOCAL_MULTIPLATFORM_TEST_EXIT_CODE=$LOCAL_TEST_EXIT" >> $GITHUB_ENV; exit $LOCAL_TEST_EXIT
scripts.ci:build-chrome: npm run build-chrome && cd chrome-extension && zip -r ../chrome-extension-$GITHUB_SHA.zip * && cd ..
scripts.ci:build-ios: npm run ios-build-local 2>&1 | tee ios-build.log; IOS_EXIT=${PIPESTATUS[0]}; echo "IOS_BUILD_EXIT_CODE=$IOS_EXIT" >> $GITHUB_ENV; exit $IOS_EXIT
scripts.ci:upload-testflight: npm run prepare-profiles && npm run ios-build -- --upload --apple-id $APPLE_ID --app-password $APP_SPECIFIC_PASSWORD 2>&1 | tee testflight-upload.log; echo "TESTFLIGHT_EXIT_CODE=${PIPESTATUS[0]}" >> $GITHUB_ENV

author: History Sync Extension
